document_data.name: Anticipation
document_data.mainbody: '''''Anticipation''''' was a [[wizard]] [[spell]] from the school of [[divination]].
document_data.Effects: This useful spell allowed the caster to foresee the actions of all creatures within a {{SI|60|foot|long=yes}} radius, allowing the caster to act accordingly. This spell did not work against the [[undead]] or creatures native to other planes. By default, ''anticipation'' revealed the presence and location of any invisible creatures.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
